titleStmt.title: Certaine letters of Henry Jeanes minister of Gods word at Chedzoy and Dr. Jeremy Taylor concerning a passage of his, in his further explication of originall sin.
titleStmt.author: Jeanes, Henry, 1611-1662.
Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.
